Name: Emberlight
About the game: Darkness has taken over the Kingdom of Zirelle after the fire demon Rrath attacked. Help princess Zirelle in her journey to defeat Rrath and bring back light to the kingdom in this fast paced platform adventure. Stages: Nine stages with different environments. The princess must guide her way through unknown lands, enemies and traps to make it to the end of each stage. Enemies and Traps There are multiple traps laid out across the stages. 20 Enemy Types to face. Each enemy is randomly generated on each of the stages to provide a unique experience every time. Will you make it to the other side? Online High scores The game has an online scoreboard. Compete with your friends in completing the levels. Aim for quickest completion times or the highest scores.
